Sentencas: In this work we report a study of (ZrO2)(1-y)(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)(y) solid solution crystals (x = 0.08-0.10; y = 0.005-0.015) grown by skull melting technique.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of melt grown Sc2O3 and CeO2 doped ZrO2 crystals

Sentencas: The crystal structure of the material was studied using Xray diffraction, Raman spectroscopy and impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of melt grown Sc2O3 and CeO2 doped ZrO2 crystals

Sentencas: The study showed that optically homogeneous and transparent crystals cannot be grown from the melt in the experimental composition range.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of melt grown Sc2O3 and CeO2 doped ZrO2 crystals

Sentencas: For overall stabilizing oxide concentrations of above 10 mol% the crystals contained a cubic phase and a rhombohedral one, whereas at concentrations of lower than 10 mol% a cubic and a tetragonal phases coexisted.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of melt grown Sc2O3 and CeO2 doped ZrO2 crystals

Sentencas: Ceria introduction into the (ZrO2)(1-x)(Sc2O3)(x) system increases its high-temperature ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of melt grown Sc2O3 and CeO2 doped ZrO2 crystals

Sentencas: The highest ionic conductivity was observed in 0.5 mol% ceria containing crystals.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of melt grown Sc2O3 and CeO2 doped ZrO2 crystals
